trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>通过启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>其他链接。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" /> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 被单击的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> class with the specified link.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的链接初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" /> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 被单击的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> class with the specified link and the specified mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的链接和指定的鼠标按钮初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the mouse button that causes the link to be clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取使链接被单击的鼠标按钮。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> named `LinkLabel1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>名为`LinkLabel1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" /> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取被单击的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" />。

trans-unit.source: A link on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 上的链接。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class, with multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> sections defined, to display a label on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>类，具有多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>部分定义，以在窗体上显示标签。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>可自定义的外观属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>使用指定的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Additional links are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 更多链接添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: 示例句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>通过启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>其他链接。
